lex.text: The Atatürk Monument, located in Izmir, Turkey (lead by the President of Turkey), was inaugurated on the 27th of July, 1932.
lex.template: AGENT-1 , located in BRIDGE-1 (lead by PATIENT-1) , was inaugurated on PATIENT-2 .

lex.text: Ahmet Davutoglu is the President of Turkey. The Ataturk Monument (Izmir) is located in Turkey.
lex.template: PATIENT-2 is PATIENT-1 . AGENT-1 is located in BRIDGE-1 .

lex.text: Ahmet Davutoglu is the leader of Turkey, officially known as the President of Turkey. This country is where the Ataturk monument (Izmir) can be located.
lex.template: PATIENT-2 is the leader of BRIDGE-1 , officially known as PATIENT-1 . BRIDGE-1 is where AGENT-1 can be located .

lex.text: The Atatürk Monument is in Turkey, where Ahmet Davutoglu is the leader and holds the title of President of Turkey.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is in BRIDGE-1 , where PATIENT-2 is the leader and holds the title of PATIENT-1 .
